data.title: Tentative Schedule
data.text:
Sessions by Thread

The 2024 System Dynamics Conference - Bergen Norway

These materials are networking tools for members of the Society, those who attended the conference and the System Dynamics community more broadly.

The Conference provides a venue for presenting work and receiving comments that can strengthen the work and help to prepare it for wider distribution.

The Conference Record provides a complete record of presentations at the Conference. They are not intended to be a substitute for publishing in peer-reviewed journals, and some papers may be truncated or include only an abstract. The Societyâs Conference Record does not have an ISBN. The Bound, Printed Full Set or CD-ROM of the Proceeding include an ISBN and those numbers are available from our independent publisher.

Readers are encouraged to contact authors or search scientific and business publications to determine if more authoratative and up-to-date versions of works included here exist.

Note for conference attendees the full schedule with links to sessions and locations is available on the conference website. (You will need to log in if you have not done so already.)
